scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run changelog
scripts.version: npm run lint:fix && git add -A src
scripts.bump-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && bundle exec fastlane bump
scripts.bump-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && bundle exec fastlane bump
scripts.bump-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && bundle exec fastlane bump
